core:process.core:name: GetCardNumber
core:process.core:comment: Capture a payment card by ICC, MSR or Keyed input. Includes ApplicationSelection for ICC. Applies fallback rules appropriate for EMV payment cards.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Retry is possible, but if we have been given some (MSR) card data, try and use it, even though fallback may not yet be allowed.

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: Fallback because ICC reader is not available. We may wish to treat this differently from fallback due to error reading card.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Retry is possible, but if we got some MSR card data and this is a refund or cheque tender, just use it straight away because we don't process ICCs as full EMV for refunds or cheque guarantee anyway.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Increment retry count, goto fallback if retries == max attempts

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: The IC card could not be read and fallback is not allowed

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: 'Unexpected' Error in our device driver software. ERROR_SOFTWARE = 5

core:assignAction.core:comment: Card swiped while contactless enabled. Card event will follow.

Merchant Name is got from location address Organisation potentially combined with Town. If organisation is not defined, will be left blank. If left blank, default in contactless reader config may be used. Merchant Name is used in contactless and potentially displayed on consumer device during CDCVM.

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: notEmpty(merchantName) && notEmpty(location.locationAddress.town) ? concat(merchantName, concat(' ', location.locationAddress.town)) : null

core:action.core:name: EnableDevicesAction
core:action.core:comment: Shouldn't get here with connection not enabled but ensure it is otheriwse it'll never connect.

core:eventLink.core:comment: IC Card is inserted but application not yet read (panToken not yet available).
IC Card inserted but application selection required.
MSR or Keyboard input of card details
IC Card has been inserted and the application (card details) has been read.
Treat as a 'disconnected' event if offline and is a standard DEVICE_ERROR

core:state.core:comment: This state is needed so that the GetCardNumber prompt state is no longer listening on events. Otherwise any events that come in while we are in the DoICCApplicationSelection process will be acted upon from GetCardNumber, and also possibly in the called process if they are listened to there as well.

core:messageState.core:comment: The IC card could not be read and fallback is not allowed

core:messageState.core:messageText: Card input must be via secure Payment Module only.

core:eventLink.core:comment: This case is supposed to allow contactless, but as we sometimes seem to get this condition from the Miura when we probably shouldn't, easist is simply to not re-enable contactless in this case. The operator would eb able to do it manually if required.
